title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Skills: Mobile Microlearning for Multicultural Scientific Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of core scientific concepts and experience with online discussions
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three cross-cultural science education case studies via an online discussion platform
Learners can utilize multicultural science materials collected via mobile devices in collaborative discussions
Learners can produce one culture-sensitive science lesson design plan by incorporating feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
